ca.ualberta.cs.c301f13t13.backend

Class StoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.c301f13t13.backend.StoryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StoringManager

    public class StoryManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements StoringManager
    Role: Interacts with the database to store, update, and retrieve story objects. It implements the StoringManager interface and inherits from the Model class, meaning it can hold SHViews and notify them if they need to be updated. Design Pattern: Singleton
    Author:
    Stephanie Gil, Ashley Brown
    See Also:
    Story, StoringManager

      • setSearchCriteria

        public java.lang.String setSearchCriteria(java.lang.Object object,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sArgs)
        Creates the selection string (a prepared statement) to be used in the database query. Also creates an array holding the items to be placed in the ? of the selection.
        Specified by:
        setSearchCriteria in interface StoringManager
        Parameters:
        object - Holds the data needed to build the selection string and the selection arguments array.
        sArgs - Holds the arguments to be passed into the selection string.
        Returns:
        String The selection string, i.e. the where clause that will be used in the sql query.
